name: Penguin Aquarium
description:
This is the best penguin app.
- You can grow a penguin.
- You can know growth of penguin in real time.
- Operation is very easy!

Care is very easy. You should feed penguin once every three days, and clean up only once a week.
Penguin is very small at first, but it will grow bigger little by little every day.
Enjoy the growth of penguin in your daily life!
